what is x.org?: i'm running xubuntu on a 5-6 year old acer travelmate, i'm trying to make it run faster any ideas? read somewhere that you could uninstall x.org, is it good or bad?
uninstalling xorg would provide you with no GUI,just the commandline
but yes, it could speed things up - or, you could install a distro that's less memory/proc intensive, such as Xubuntu or EliveCD
